file.name: api__anwen_v001.yaml
file.content:
# this is the Anwen API API spec in YAML
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  title: Anwen API
  description: Make the world a better place with the Anwen API
  version: "1.0.0"
servers:
  - url: https://anwensf.com/api
paths:
  /shares:
    get:
      summary: All kind of things shared by users
      description: The Shares endpoint returns all shares. The response includes the details about each share.
      parameters:
        - name: offset
          in: query
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
          description: Offset the list of returned results by this amount. Default is zero.
        - name: limit
          in: query
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
          description: Number of items to retrieve. Default is 10, maximum is 100.
      security:
        - apikey: []
      tags:
        - Shares
      responses:
        '200':
          description: An array of shares
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ShareList"
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
  /me:
    get:
      summary: User Profile
      description: The User Profile endpoint returns information about the Anwen user that has authorized.
      tags:
        - User
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Profile information for a user
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Profile"
        default:
          description: Unexpected error
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
components:
  securitySchemes:
    apikey:
      type: apiKey
      name: server_token
      in: query
  schemas:
    Share:
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int32
          description: Unique identifier representing a specific share.
        title:
          type: string
          description: title.
        markdown:
          type: string
          description: the content with markdown format.
    ShareList:
      properties:
        Shares:
          description: Contains the list of shares
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Share"
    Profile:
      properties:
        user_name:
          type: string
          description: Name of the Anwen user.
        user_email:
          type: string
          description: Email address of the Anwen user
        user_pic:
          type: string
          description: Image URL of the Anwen user.
    Error:
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
        fields:
          type: string
